articles.description: Virender Sehwag once requested Sachin Tendulkar to 'save' him from Wasim Akram. The former India opener narrated the entire incident. | Cricket
articles.content: Indian cricketers are right up there when you think of the greatest opening pairs in ODI cricket. Sachin Tendulkar and Sourav Ganguly, statistically, are still the best with 6609 runs from 136 inning… [+3805 chars]
